SEARCH
Package edu.core.reservation

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
edu.core.reservation.Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Documents information of a single reservation.

Each Room object should have a wait-list attribute to hold all the Users waiting for the room.

See Also:

      room - room to assign to the reservation

      endCountry - ending country of the reservation
